thread.section_title: Burgers' Smokehouse Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Burgers' Smokehouse | smokehouse.com
thread.title: Ken E.
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Ken E.

author: Ken E.
title: Ken E.
text: Excellent service and products, being single I enjoy the items packaged in smaller portions and can easily freeze for later use. Would like to see some products offered that are organic, hormone , antibiotics free, etc., but I have never been disappointed in my selections. Years ago I lived in Missouri and now 25 years later I still order and have them shipped. To Florida .
